context.p: Ensure that VMware Tools are installed in the images that will be installed and run within the Eucalyptus cloud. These tools allow Eucalyptus to discover an instanceâ€™s IP address in SYSTEM networking mode. They also are required for using the euca-bundle-instance command when running Windows VMs in Eucalyptus. For information on euca-bundle-instance, see the Eucalyptus User Guide. For information on installing VMware Tools, consult VMware documentation at http://www.vmware.com.
